document.full_text: a decade-old racial discrimination case against jim crane, who put in the winning bid to take over the houston astros, could create a potential problem for bud selig.
document.title: bias case may pose a problem for bidder
lines_and_colors: a decade-old racial discrimination case against jim crane, who put in the winning bid to take over the houston astros, could create a potential problem for bud selig.
